title: CanopyCartographer
sub_title: A tool for segmenting and monitoring forests from Landsat imagery

title: FiTriMap
sub_title: A Python package designed for acquiring and processing spatial 'wildfire triangle' data

title: WeatherFetch
sub_title: WeatherFetch automatically downloads climatic variables and outputs them in analysis-ready spatial formats

title: ConDecMapper
sub_title: Individual tree detection and classification from RGB satellite imagery with applications to wildfire fuel mapping and exposure assessments

title: DroneImageMapper
sub_title: A convenient way to spatially map surveys and keep track of flight parameters.

title: RGBtoLASinator
sub_title: A simple package that reads 2D image annotations (in PascalVOC format) and infers the third dimension using a pointcloud, allowing for 3D boxes, tree height estimation, and annotated pointclouds
